snippet: Christine C. Quinn’s mayoral campaign attacked a Democratic opponent, William C. Thompson Jr., for accepting financial backing from Alfonse M. D’Amato, a former Republican senator.
abstract: New York City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn's mayoral campaign attacks Democratic opponent William C Thompson Jr for accepting financial backing from Alfonse M D’Amato, former Republican senator, signaling a shift in race's dynamic; previously Quinn's aides tried to create an air of inevitability around her candidacy, without getting drawn into fights.
lead_paragraph: Christine C. Quinn’s mayoral campaign attacked a Democratic opponent, William C. Thompson Jr., for accepting financial backing from Alfonse M. D’Amato, a former Republican senator.

headline.seo: Quinn Criticizes Thompson for Accepting D’Amato’s Money
headline.main: Quinn Camp Excoriating Thompson on D’Amato
headline.print_headline: Quinn Camp Excoriating Thompson On D’Amato
